articles.title: Data Integration with Zeotap
articles.content:
To integrate data with Zeotap:
                1. Set up a Zeotap account
                2. Configure data source connections
                3. Define data mapping schema
                4. Set up identity resolution rules
                5. Configure data export destinations
                
                Integration methods:
                - API integration
                - Batch file uploads
                - Server-to-server connections
                - Tag management systems

articles.title: Browse by product
articles.content:
Learn how to use Zeotap CDP to collect, unify and activate your customer data
across multiple platforms.

[ ![Unify Logo](/resources/Storage/Stars.png) **Get Started with Zeotap CDP**
**  
**  
Learn how to use the different modules within Zeotap CDP and get started.
](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!get-started-guide/getting-started/)

##  **Browse by product**

[ ![Integrate Logo](/resources/Storage/Integrate%20\(2\).png)  
**Integrate**  
  
Discover how to use **Sources** and **Destinations** to integrate your
disparate data sources and activate your data across platforms. ****
](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!integrate-customer/integrate)

[ ![Unify Logo](/resources/Storage/unify.png)  
**Unify**  
Discover how to use **Catalogue** , **Calculated Attributes** and **ID
Strategy** to unify your customer data.
](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!unify-customer/unify)

[ ![Segment Logo](/resources/Storage/segment.png)  
**Segment**  
Discover how to use **Audiences** to create cohorts and activate your customer
data. ](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!segment-customer/segment)

[ ![Orchestrate Logo](/resources/Storage/Orchestrate%20\(1\).png)  
**Orchestrate**  
Discover how to use **Journeys** to orchestrate personalised workflows with
actionable recommendations. ](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!orchestrate-
customer/orchestrate)

[ ![Analyse Logo](/resources/Storage/analyze.png)  
**Dashboard**  
Discover how to use **Dashboard** to analyse your platform usage, exploring
consumption metrics and more. ](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!dashboard-
customer/overview)

[ ![Protect Logo](/resources/Storage/protect%20\(1\).png)  
**Protect**  
Discover how to use **Consent, Customer 360** and **Data Lifecycle** to
protect your customer data by being compliant with regulatory frameworks.
](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!protect-customer/protect)

##  **Do more with Zeotap**

[ ![Target Icon](/resources/Storage/Group 427319166.png)  
**Target**  
Discover how to use **Target** to create and activate deterministic third-
party Audience. ](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!targeting-
customer/2969141372)

[ ![ID+ Icon](/resources/Storage/Group 427319160.png)  
**ID+**  
Discover how to use **ID+** to create custom journeys and provide optimal
actions. ](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!id-publication/basic-
integration-guide_v2)

[ ![Admin Icon](/resources/Storage/Group%20427319168%20\(1\).png)  
**Admin**  
Discover how to use **Admin** to create organisations and add users with
specific roles and access. ](https://docs.zeotap.com/articles/#!admin-
customer/admin)

![CDP image](https://content.zeotap.com/img/zeotap-login-image1.svg)

logo](https://ok9static.oktacdn.com/fs/bco/1/fs09iwu6lm0q0LUfL417)
